about_the_game:
Engage in fast, intense, and thrilling battles

A variety of different types of weapons, combined with shields, form a rich combat style.

A variety of weapon skills allow you to defeat enemies through long-range combat, close range combat, harassment and control, or powerful explosive power.

Each enemy has different weapons and unique combat styles, making battles very fast and exciting.

Proficient skills will help you defeat the strong with the weak, but you can also prepare a large amount of consumables to persist until you defeat the enemy.

Explore the vast world

Understand the cooperation and conflicts among the four countries on the mainland, and learn about their stories of competition and covert struggles.

Every enemy you face is a powerful warrior from various organizations on the continent.

Understand their deeds and obtain the truth about various events or mysteries on the continent from different perspectives.

Production and processing of various foods and raw materials

Without sufficient supplies, powerful warriors will become weak and powerless.

By utilizing the farm of Nongsheng Hall and the kitchen of Rikushima Shrine, a large amount of food raw materials are produced and processed into highly functional foods.

With sufficient food, you can defeat any enemy!

Defeat insects and collect resources in the jungle

Tired of the tension brought by battle? Or is there too little food produced on the farm? Perhaps there are still enough resources to obtain the blacksmith's help?

It's okay, the jungle will bring you a brand new rogue gameplay, and the constantly spinning weapons will allow you to constantly harvest materials from the jungle.

The longer you persist in the jungle, the more materials you can obtain, giving you enough fertilizer to produce more food and enough ore to upgrade your equipment.

A card game originating from the desert

Are coins always not enough? Maybe you can try your luck and get rich overnight.

Desert merchants offer a reward rich card game, which is said to contain a lot of wealth.

Please be sure to give it a try, of course, desert merchants wouldn't let wealth be so easily obtained.

Operating a restaurant

Relying on one's own labor to gradually accumulate wealth, although it may not sound as tempting as card games, one labor can definitely bring a harvest.

A simple and poor small restaurant can become a beautiful and prosperous big restaurant after your hard work.

Every gold coin spent on a restaurant will bring you returns during its operation.

short_description: Come and experience the fast and exciting cold weapon battles! Understand the vast world of Azeroth in battle; By using exquisite combat skills to defeat the weak, managing a farm to produce food, and running a tavern to accumulate gold coins and upgrade equipment.
